author: robwR8347PW
title: Satisfied-Will stay here again.
text: I traveled with my teenage daughters to NYC and we found the Hilton Garden Inn to be a great place to stay. Easy walk to Central Park and to shopping. Very close to theaters, but away from the business of Times Square. On the 15th floor, we barely heard any street traffic-only the occasional siren, but even that was faint. We always felt perfectly safe here as well. My husband stays in this location when he travels to New York for business and finds it convenient for his purposes.
